articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Dental Hygiene Products Factory
articles.content:
Premier Inspects Dental Hygiene Products Factory
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, inspected the Pyongyang Dental Hygiene Products Factory.
					 Going round various parts of the factory, he encouraged its officials and employees in dedicating wisdom and enthusiasm to keeping the production going at a high rate and providing the people with quality dental hygiene products.
					
					 At a consultative meeting there, measures were taken to meticulously organize the management and produce more diverse products conducive to promoting the people's health.
					
					 The premier also inspected the science exhibition hall of the State Academy of Sciences and the Pyongyang Pharmaceutical Factory, where he called for introducing earlier innovative successes made by scientists and technicians into major sectors of the national economy, and urged the relevant units to satisfactorily supply raw and other materials to the factories related to public health.

articles.title: European Politicians Visit Various Places
articles.content:
European Politicians Visit Various Places
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of politicians from various political parties in Europe led by Jonathan Powell of the British Labor Party, former Downing Street Chief of Staff to Prime Minister Tony Blair, visited the Sci-Tech Complex.
					 It went round e-reading room, applied sci-tech hall and other parts of the complex.
					
					 It also toured the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory and the Masikryong Ski Resort.

articles.title: New Natural Monuments Registered
articles.content:
New Natural Monuments Registered
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The Kosong pine tree and Jongbangsan Kumsujong spring water were newly registered as natural monuments in the DPRK.
					 The pine tree, determined to be 166 years old, is on a small hill in Sinbong-ri, Kosong County of Kangwon Province.
					
					 It is 13.6 meters in height, 3.48 meters in girth of lower part and 4.3 meters in girth of middle part, while the diameter of its crown is 17.6 meters from east to west and 15.7 meters from south to north.
					
					 When looking round the pine tree in July Juche 93 (2004), leader Kim Jong Il called for carefully protecting it, saying that it is rarely big and good to see.
					
					 The Kumsujong spring water is welling forth from quartzite and schist strata under Mt Jongbang, one of famous mountains in the DPRK.
					
					 Its temperature is always 11 degrees centigrade and it has the property of sub-acid calcium bicarbonate with 61.75mg/L in mineral components and 6.5 pH.
					
					 The spring water was discovered in April last year.

articles.title: Preparations for 22nd Kimjongilia Festival Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for 22nd Kimjongilia Festival Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Preparations for the 22nd Kimjongilia Festival are brisk in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The theme of the festival is "Kimjongilia in full bloom all over Juche Korea demonstrating its honor as a great power".
					
					 Now, it is going on to decorate the inner part of the festival venue artistically and formatively as required by the theme.
					
					 According to an official concerned, the enthusiasm to participate in the festival grows evermore stronger, as this year marks the 30th anniversary of the naming of the immortal flower Kimjongilia.
					
					 In recent years, successes have been made in the scientific research into Kimjongilia cultivation and introduced into Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses across the country, thus making it possible to display many more potted Kimjongilias at the festival, the official said, and went on:
					
					 The Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, the Ministry of Agriculture, the Ponghwa Guidance Bureau and other units reconstructed their Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses to meet scientific and technological needs and applied advanced methods to Kimjongilia cultivation.
					
					 The preparation for the festival also gains momentum in every province.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hits U.S. Scheme to Turn Olympiad into Confrontation Theater
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hits U.S. Scheme to Turn Olympiad into Confrontation Theater
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has revealed its intention to make the Winter Olympics a theatre for stand-off with the DPRK.
					 The U.S. vice-president claimed that he would take part in the Winter Olympics and hold back "north Korea's propaganda offensive", according to the U.S. magazine News Week on Jan. 24.
					
					 Timed to coincide with this, a White House official said the vice-president will hold a series of press conferences before and during the Olympics and he is determined to make sure that "the Olympic ground would not turn into a propaganda ground for north Korea during the two-week period".
					
					 This is aimed to check the trend for improved inter-Korean ties that has gained momentum thanks to the DPRK's bold and proactive efforts, and to drive a wedge among the Koreans.
					
					 Clear is the stand of the DPRK to ensure that the Winter Olympics is successfully held as a great event of the homogenous nation and to strikingly manifest the dignity and might of the nation, and this is supported and welcomed by the international community.
					
					 The DPRK's efforts to bring about a drastic progress in accomplishing the cause of independent reunification based on the first step that had been taken at the outset of the year have nothing to do with the "propaganda offensive".
					
					 But how is the U.S. behaving at a time when the Korean nation is about to pool efforts and open a new chapter for peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 On the eve of the Olympics the U.S. is unhesitatingly committing acts of insulting the sincerity made by the DPRK and ruining the Olympics by rendering the political and military threats toward the DPRK to the extremes, and dispatching strategic assets including nuclear carrier and special units.
					
					 Chinese Hong Kong paper South China Morning Post in an editorial said that the U.S. is doing what it should not do, adding that the origin of all the measures taken by the U.S. recently is questionable after the north and the south of Korea resumed the talks.
					
					 Konstantin Kosachev, chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the Russian Federal Assembly, said that it is a wrong interpretation of the present situation for Americans to behave as if their continued act of ratcheting up sanctions and pressure together with the regional allies does not have any impact, adding that this may have extremely dangerous impact on the development of the situation as a whole, and the positive trend concerning the resumption of the direct dialogue between the north and the south may disappear after the Winter Olympics due to the West's approach.
					
					 All facts clearly prove once again who wishes for successful Winter Olympics and peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and who fans up the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is quite natural that the international community is concerned about what the U.S. vice-president is going to do targeting the DPRK at the Winter Olympics.
					
					 The U.S. should not run amuck.
					
					 It will invite international isolation as it fails to face up to the trend of the times.

articles.title: Illusion about Imperialism Is Deadly Virus: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Illusion about Imperialism Is Deadly Virus: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Illusion about imperialism makes it impossible to maintain independence in politics and self-sustenance in economy, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article.
					 If a country is obsessed by illusion about imperialism, its sovereignty is violated and flouted and it won't escape from doom, the article says, adding:
					
					 The tragic situation in Iraq and Libya clearly proved this.
					
					 Today, the imperialists' strong-arm policy is facing the fate of doom.
					
					 Creating such illusion is no more than last-ditch efforts of the imperialists to realize their ambition to dominate the world.
					
					 If one fails to discern this and harbors such illusion, one will cook one's own goose as well as help the imperialists prolong their remaining days.
					
					 The countries aspiring after independence should keep strict vigilance over and root out the slightest illusion about imperialism and adhere to the Juche character and national character.
					
					 It is the lesson of history and the truth that illusion about imperialism precisely means death.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Sinister Design of Evacuation Drills in U.S., Japan
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Sinister Design of Evacuation Drills in U.S., Japan
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Friday comments on the recent evacuations, often staged in the U.S. and Japan plagued with an increasing nuclear phobia, to cope with the "missile threat" from the DPRK.
					 The commentary says:
					
					 The residents of Michigan, the U.S., recently were in the grip of fear, mistaking a meteorite blast for "missile attack by north Korea" and the fear spread rapidly to the whole land of the U.S.
					
					 Prior to it, an emergency alarm for the "ballistic missile coming from north Korea" was given in Hawaii on Jan. 13, which caused great confusion. An evacuation drill was staged there in December last year to cope with "ballistic missile attack" by someone.
					
					 On Jan. 16 NHK of Japan posted on the website the flash saying that the government recommends the people to take shelter in buildings and underground as it seems that the DPRK launched a missile, which made the people tremble with extreme fear.
					
					 Against this backdrop, an evacuation drill was waged in the heart of Tokyo on Jan. 22 under the simulated conditions of the DPRK's "missile launch", which is the first of its kind in 30 years.
					
					 The experts express a strong opinion that the U.S. and Japan are seeking something from such anti-missile evacuations.
					
					 It is clear to all that the evacuations are the product of a sinister attempt to invent a justification for the hostile policy towards the DPRK by actualizing "the north's missile threat" often touted by the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 The U.S. and Japan are running amuck while hyping the story about "missile threat from the north". This cannot be construed otherwise than a premeditated move aimed to incite the anti-DPRK sentiment in the U.S. and Japanese societies and examine the readiness any time under the war scenario against the DPRK.

articles.title: Minimum Wage Hike Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Minimum Wage Hike Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Voice of People, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally in Seoul on Jan. 30 in demand of minimum wage hike.
					 Speakers urged the "government" to set right the illegal acts of checking the minimum wage hike.
					
					 Other organizations held a press conference in Seoul that day to denounce gentries of the conservative opposition parties for opposing the minimum wage hike.

articles.title: World Peace-loving People Called to Join in Creating Climate for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
World Peace-loving People Called to Join in Creating Climate for Korea's Reunification
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The Congolese Association for Friendship among Peoples issued an appeal to the world peace-loving people on Jan. 22 in support of the independent reunification of Korea.
					 The year 2018 is a significant year marking the 70th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the great feat and legacy of immortal President Kim Il Sung, the appeal said, expressing support for the occasions created for improving the inter-Korean relations thanks to the noble love for the nation and the peace-loving will of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the great guardian of peace and justice.
					
					 It noted that since its founding, the DPRK has made efforts for its independent development and the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula. It called upon the world peace-loving people to actively join in creating the climate for the improved inter-Korean ties and the independent reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" on Jan. 23 ahead of the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life dedicated to the country and the people.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Britain
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Britain
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A British preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed in London on Jan. 22.
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events such as a seminar on Kim Jong Il's work.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Indonesia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed on Jan. 23.
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Jan. 25 to Feb. 16 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Germany
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the Communist Party of Germany on Jan. 22.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Jan. 22 to Feb. 16 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events in praise of Kim Jong Il's exploits in the period.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre la Fabrica de Articulos de Higiene Dental de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre la Fabrica de Articulos de Higiene Dental de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, averiguo en el terreno la situacion de la Fabrica de Articulos de Higiene Dental de Pyongyang.
					Recorriendo varios puntos, el estimulo a los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica que se esfuerzan mucho por normalizar la produccion en alto nivel y ofrecer a los habitantes los articulos de higiene dental de buena calidad. 
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno se tomaron las medidas para mejorar las actividades empresariales y aumentar la produccion de articulos de higiene dental que contribuyan al fomento de salud publica. 
					
					Ademas, el premier visito la Exposicion de Ciencias de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias y la Fabrica Farmaceutica de Pyongyang donde instruyo introducir lo mas pronto posible en importantes dominios de la economia nacional los exitos innovadores alcanzados por los cientificos y tecnicos y exigir a las entidades vinculadas suministrar suficientemente a las fabricas de la rama de salud publica las materias primas y materiales necesarios.

articles.title: Efectuado seminario del sector de ciencias sociales
articles.content:
Efectuado seminario del sector de ciencias sociales
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia primero en el Museo de la Revolucion Coreana el seminario del sector de ciencias sociales sobre las proezas realizadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un para la construccion y el desarrollo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares.
					Participaron en la ocasion los profesores, investigadores, conferenciantes, periodistas, redactores y funcionarios de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, prensa e informacion, historia revolucionaria y organo de formacion de los cuadros partidistas.
					
					Se presentaron las tesis que explican y argumentan las proezas y la sabiduria de direccion de los lideres coreanos quienes fundaron y desarrollaron el Ejercito Popular de Corea como el revolucionario e invencible.
					
					Los oradores explicaron que la idea del Presidente en materia de desarrollo del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea como Ejercito Popular de Corea es la de construccion del ejercito que formulo de manera cientifica la esencia y la mision de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y la fase legitima y el metodo de su construccion.
					
					Apuntaron que la fundacion del EPC fue un acontecimiento historico que proclamo a todo el mundo el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares y el producto de la autoctona ideologia e ideal sobre la misma materia y de la probada y destacada direccion del Presidente.
					
					Se refirieron a que el Dirigente fortalecio el EPC como el del lider y del partido.
					
					Subrayaron que materializar cabalmente la idea y guia del Maximo Dirigente deviene la garantia para desarrollar el EPC como confiable punto de apoyo para defender firmemente la causa del partido y como el fuerte en la ideologia y conviccion con el espiritu indoblegable.

articles.title: ACNC comenta intento de EE.UU. de utilizar Olimpiada como escenario de enfrentamiento
articles.content:
ACNC comenta intento de EE.UU. de utilizar Olimpiada como escenario de enfrentamiento
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- EE.UU. expone abiertamente su siniestro intento de utilizar los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales como escenario de enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Segun reporto News Week el 24 de enero, el vicepresidente norteamericano Pence dijo que impedira la "ofensiva de propaganda del Norte de Corea" durante su participacion en los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales. 
					
					Un funcionario de la Casa Blanca tambien anuncio que antes y durante la cita deportiva, Pence concedera algunas conferencias de prensa y tiene la decision de "no dejar en dos dias y noches que los Juegos Olimpicos se conviertan en el campo de propaganda del Norte de Corea". 
					
					Este disparate del caudillo de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion de Corea parte de su intencion de bloquear a toda costa la corriente hacia la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, preparada por la iniciativa y los esfuerzos magnanimos de la RPDC, y meter cunas entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					Como es conocido por todos, la RPDC tiene la firme posicion de celebrar los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales como gran evento nacional junto con la parte connacional y manifestar a todo el mundo la dignidad y el impetu de la nacion, lo cual gana el apoyo de la sociedad internacional. 
					
					No tienen nada que ver con la "ofensiva propagandista" los esfuerzos de la RPDC por lograr un avance trascendental en el cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion de la patria aprovechando la buena partida que se ha dado en el comienzo del ano nuevo. 
					
					En estos momentos en que la nacion coreana trata de abrir con las fuerzas unidas una nueva pagina de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, EE.UU. aumenta al extremo la amenaza politica y militar contra la RPDC trasladando a la Peninsula Coreana las flotillas de portaaviones nucleares y otras propiedades estrategicas y las tropas especiales. Al mismo tiempo, insulta sin escrupulos los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC e incurre en actos que rompen el clima de la Olimpiada. 
					
					South China Morning Post de Hong Kong senalo en su editorial que ahora EE.UU. hace lo que no debe hacer y agrego que cuando se ha reanudado el dialogo Norte-Sur, levantan sospechas las medidas recien tomadas por EE.UU. 
					
					El presidente del Comite de Asuntos Internacionales del Consejo de la Federacion Rusa, Konstantin Kosachev, dijo que los estadounidenses intensifican sin parar la sancion y presion junto con sus aliados regionales y actuan como si no pasara nada. Continuo que esta mala interpretacion sobre la situacion actual puede perjudicar la evolucion de la situacion y que la corriente positiva a la reanudacion del dialogo Norte-Sur puede desaparecer despues de los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales debido a la conducta del Occidente. 
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran una vez mas quien desea de veras la marcha exitosa de los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales y la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y quien incita la agravacion de tension de esta zona. 
					
					Es natural que la sociedad internacional exprese la preocupacion por lo que hara el vicepresidente estadounidense contra la RPDC durante la Olimpiada. 
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que su mal juicio sobre la tendencia de la epoca actual le conducira al aislamiento en la arena internacional.
